metadata.title: Arctic Bottle Data Collated under ESDIM Data Rescue

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Bottle Data: Nutrient, Oxygen, Temperature, Salinity, Pressure data was collected on ICE 90 and 91 cruises.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: The purpose was to collect nutrient and oxygen data to estimate biological activity and elemental fluxes of materials for biota in the Chukchi Sea.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None.

Use constraints: None.
